thread.section_title: AMR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMR | amr.com.au
thread.title: Emily Borg

author: Emily Borg
title: Emily Borg
text:
I have previously worked for a hair and beauty supplier for 5 years, its a full on job, always have to be on the ball, one minor mistake can impact a salon in so many ways.
I couldn't be happier with the service AMR supply me, the website is fantastic so easy to order, wide variety of stock and brands. I live in country Victoria and my orders always come two days after being placed, and the price is great (its actually cheaper than ordering through my previous work even with staff discount).
Thankyou AMR Team, keep up the great work and awesome service. x
